explore.cardParagraph: Devcash Bounty Platform is a decentralized bounty platform where users can post or hunt bounties.  You can explore the bounties below.

post.cardParagraph: Enter the details of your bounty below to create it.

heroSection.paragraph: Join our global community of blockchain developers and make the most of your skills.

whatIsSection.paragraph: Devcash (DEV) is cash for the developer economy. It is the official currency of Blockchain Developers United. Devcash offers various services such as a bounty platform and a decentralize exchange to make developers’ jobs easier.

IBOSection.paragraph: Initial bounty offering, or IBO in short, is inspired by ICO. Instead of money, you put your skills and time to build awesome things to get Devcash.  The IBO will be powered by Devcash Bounty Platform.

bountyPlatformSection.paragraph: The Devcash bounty platform is a decentralized bounty platform where users utilize DEV to crowdsource developer talent or perform developer tasks and earn DEV.
bountyPlatformSection.postBountyParagraph: Post a task, crowdsource developer talent.

dexSection.paragraph: The Devcash DEX is a decentralized exchange with an ETH/DEV market. It is fully automated on Ethereum smart contracts and offers zero-fee trading.

startExploringSection.paragraph: Start exploring Devcash bounty platform and join our global community of developers. Earn DEV using your skills or crowdsource developer talent.
